author: tobiwo
content: <@144468805697929216> Is ethdo EIP-2335-compatible already? So in other words, could I create a wallet and the respective keystores to use with lighthouse? Couldn't find that information on github.

author: jgm
content: > <@!710132892197453824> ethdo is compatible with EIP-2335 as far as it goes, however ethdo accounts have an additiona; 'name' field that can cause problems with some clients.  There is a discussion about it at https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/1361
